TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Jon_Brockman, title = Jon_Brockman, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jon_Brockman} }

S.FORM: Jon Brockman nalecuhan i Snohomish, Washington, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Jon Brockman i 2009 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 38 namapili' tu nu Portland Trail Blazers putiput. 3 bulad 20 demiad, 1987 a mihca, Jon Brockman, miunduay. u canan ku NBA kanatal kanas-mali putiput, Amilika: National Basketball Association, sapuyu'en NBA, u Amis-Amilika tatama syubay kanas-mali putiput. izaw 30 a mali cebang, mikitinay tusa a subal, sawaliyan atu satipan. cacay subal izaw tulu a cu, cacay a cu izaw lima a cebang, cacay cebang namakay Canada, u zama sa namakay Amilika. kya madademec "Amilika syubay kanas-mali nisakaput sasasedsed, acasa "Amilika kanas nisakaput sasasedsed", sapuyu'en "Amilika syubay kanas", acasa kakelul han NBA.

Jon Brockman nalecohan i Snohomish, Washington, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Jon Brockman i 2009 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ko owac ato silsil 38 namapili' to no Portland Trail Blazers potipot. 3 bolad 20 demiad, 1987 a mihca, Jon Brockman, miondoay. o canan ko NBA kanatal kanas-mali potipot, Amilika: National Basketball Association, sapoyo'en NBA, o Amis-Amilika tatama syobay kanas-mali potipot. izaw 30 a mali cebang, mikitinay tosa a sobal, sawaliyan ato satipan. cacay sobal izaw tolo a co, cacay a co izaw lima a cebang, cacay cebang namakay Canada, o zama sa namakay Amilika. kya madademec "Amilika syobay kanas-mali nisakapot sasasedsed, acasa "Amilika kanas nisakapot sasasedsed", sapoyo'en "Amilika syobay kanas", acasa kakelol han NBA.
